Jake Westbrook is really trying to keep Andrew McCutchen close; he is 20-for-27 in stolen base attempts this season.
Jake Westbrook really has his changeup working; he's allowing a .215 average against it this season and Pirates hitters are 0-for-4 against it in this game.
